text: Mostowice () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Bystrzyca Kłodzka, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland, near the border with the Czech Republic. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately west of Bystrzyca Kłodzka, south-west of Kłodzko, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Mostowice
